activity.tip15: Step 2: Add a key in Google Authenticator and back it up Open Google Authenticator, scan the QR code below or manually enter the following key to add a verification token.

activity.tip101: Google Authenticator is a dynamic password tool that works like SMS dynamic verification. A dynamic verification code is generated every 30s after binding, and the verification code can be used for security verification during withdrawal.
activity.TermsofService:
GENERAL

As a data controller, we have a legal obligation under gambling regulations to process personal data from players in order to allow them to participate in games and provide them with ancillary services.

This Privacy Policy explains what personal data we collect from players, why we collect it and how we utilise it.

The website ("Casino", "Website", “Company”, "We", "Us", "Our") is owned and operated by BET123.IO, a company registered and established under the laws of Philippines.

If you have any other questions regarding this Privacy Policy or protection of your data, please feel free to contact us.

By registering a Player Account with the Website you confirm your consent with this Privacy Policy.

If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy and do not wish to provide us with the personal information we require, please do not use this website.

Please note that this Privacy Policy constitutes an agreement between you and the Website.

We may periodically make modifications to this Policy.

While we will do our best to notify you of such changes, we recommend that you revisit this Privacy Policy regularly.

Your continued use of the Website and/or its services will constitute your consent to the Privacy Policy.

 

INFORMATION WE COLLECT

The Personal Information which we may keep and process shall include, without limitation:

1.      Any of the information that you provide to us when filling in the forms on our account registration pages, as well as any other data that you further submit via the Website or email (e.g. first and last name, date of birth, email address, phone number);

2.     Correspondence made with us via the Website, email, live chat or through other means of communication;

3.     All Player Account transaction history, whether this takes place via the Website(s) or via other means of communication;

4.     Website logins and their details, including traffic data, IP location data, browser/device data, weblogs, activity logs and other traffic information recorded in our system;

5.     Documents and proofs reasonably requested by us to verify your account, to process deposits or withdrawals and to conduct anti-fraud checks. Such proofs may include passport scans, payment slips, bank statements, etc.

6.     Survey participations or any other customer assessments that we may carry out from time to time.

 

HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

We process the Personal Information we collect from you in order to deliver our services. In particular, we will use your data for the following purposes:

1.      Processing your bets and transactions. This includes your use of bank card and online payment systems;

2.     Providing you with gaming and other ancillary services that you seek from our Website;

3.     Rendering customer support, such as assistance with setting up and managing your account;

4.     Identifying and performing the necessary verification checks;

5.     Providing registered players with information about our promotional offers, or providing promotional information from our selected business partners, associates and affiliates (only if players specifically consented to receiving such marketing material);

6.     Monitoring and investigating transactions for the purposes of preventing fraud, terms abuse, money laundering and other illegal or irregular gaming activities;

7.     Conducting research and statistical analysis of aggregated data.

 

SECURITY OF YOUR DATA

We hereby acknowledge that in collecting and processing your Personal Information for the purposes of managing your Player Account, we are bound by strict legal provisions on the protection of personal data.

Consequently, we endeavour to protect your personal information and respect your privacy in accordance with best business practices and applicable regulations.

Being committed to providing secure services to players, and we will take all reasonable precautions to ensure that all the data that you have submitted to us remains safe.

 

COOKIE POLICY

When you visit the Website, our system automatically collects information about your visit, such as your browser, IP address, and the referring website.

This collection may be done in conjunction with our platform providers and partners. We may receive from them general demographic or usage data of our Website visitors.

We do not use automatically collected information to identify you personally without receiving additional consent.

To collect the information in question we use cookies and similar tracking tools.

Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or equipment when you visit our web pages. Some of the cookies are essential for the Website to operate; others improve your Website experience and help us deliver a better service.

Below are the types of cookies we use and their purposes. Required cookies:

1.      enable the navigation and basic functionality of the websites, e.g., access to member areas of the Website.

2.     Functional cookies: allow us to analyse your website usage and your selections on the website (e.g. your session key, language, or region), so we can save these settings and offer you a more personalised experience.

3.     Most online browsers automatically accept cookies. If you prefer, it is possible to block some or all cookies, or to delete cookies that have already been set by modifying your browser settings.

4.     However, we recommend that you do not block or delete your cookies as this may restrict your use of our Website.

The system rules and conditions shall be implemented in accordance with the amendment on October 15, 2022.

If you choose to sign up and log in to this website and continue to use it, you will default to your agreement to these terms and conditions, as well as any other imposed conditions.

 

SPECIAL NOTE

BET123.IO reminds and warns customers who intend to place bets with online betting sites should pay attention to the relevant laws and regulations of their country or place of residence.

If you have any questions, you should seek local legal opinions on related issues.

BET123.IO does not accept any responsibility caused by any customers violation of local betting or gambling laws.

BET123.IO requires all customers to read the agreement carefully and completely before accepting our services.

When you use our services, it means that you have read, understood and agreed to accept all the contents of our agreement and regulations, and promised that once you violate this agreement, you will have the following consequences: deprivation of membership, account freezing Confiscated funds and other related legal proceedings.

 

REGISTRATION

During the registration process, the user needs to ensure that the registered user is over 18 years old, and has read and agreed to the "Service Agreement" of BET123.IO.

If you choose continue to sign up and log in, it means the user has confirmed that the user has read, fully understood and agreed to this regulation, and The betting agreement used in the betting service between the user constituted by this rule and BET123.IO.

If the user does not agree to any terms in the service agreement, please do not sign up and use, and do not attempt to use or continue to use any gaming services or download and/or install BET123.IO gaming software.

 

MODIFICATION OF TERMS

We reserve the absolute right to revise, update and modify these rules and gambling rules (or any part there or anytime).

If you continue to use this website, it will be deemed that you have accepted the modification of the relevant terms and policies.

The user confirms and agrees that the user is solely responsible for reviewing the above-mentioned revisions, updates and/or modifications, and BET123.IO has no obligation to notify the user of the above-mentioned revisions, updates and modifications.

 

CONDITIONS OF USE

The user declares and promises that all the information provided by the user during registration and membership application, including the name of the user filled in the membership application, the source of funds (including the relevant bank account number and card number), any email address or contact phone number, and personal address is true, accurate and complete in all respects.

As a condition of using the gaming service, the user warrants and undertakes that it will not use or connect to gaming websites, gaming services, gaming software and/or for purposes prohibited by this term in violation of any laws applicable to users, violations of this regulation and/or purposes prohibited by this regulation/betting information.

The user conducts activities in own identity and name, instead of conducting transactions on behalf of others;

The user’s legal capacity is not restricted. The user is not diagnosed as a gambling addict, or no related problems.

The user fully understands and accepts all risk issues in the use of gambling services, not engaged in criminal or illegal, unauthorized activities or attempts to use the user’s account opened in BET123.IO to engage in the above activities.

The user shall not use the gambling service or the user’s gambling account to engage in any criminal or other illegal activities required by the law, including but not limited to money laundering.

All user shall keep your account and password confidential to prevent illegal connection or use.

If the account name, account number or password is lost in any way, immediately change the password or notify us.

The user’s account name, account number and password through the gaming website and any all activities of the connected device to use the gaming service are solely responsible, regardless of whether the above-mentioned connection/or use is authorized by the user or is known to the user；

BET123.IO will not reimburse any losses or losses caused by the use of user accounts by third parties.

The user shall bear all the responsibilities arising from the use of his login information by any third party, and shall not damage the relevant interests of BET123.IO.

Do not upload or distribute any programs, files or data that contain viruses that have been destroyed or that may affect the operation of connected equipment, gaming software, gaming services and/or gaming websites.

Do not use any equipment, machinery, devices, software, programs or other methods (or anything of the aforementioned natur· to interfere with or attempt to interfere with gaming services, connected equipment, gaming software, gaming websites, gaming information or gaming websites and/or connected equipment of the normal operation of any transaction provided.

In particular, you must not attempt and use any intelligent programs or systems (including machinery, computers, software or other automated systems) to attack BET123.IO, which has achieved the purpose of defrauding websites or users.

It is not allowed to use the users unauthorized credit and debit card to deposit, deliberately use such cards to recharge money, or to commit fraud in various ways.

Users can only open one account in BET123.IO.

If we know user has opened more than one account in BET123.IO, BET123.IO will have the right to decide to retain only one account without notifying the member, and to deal with it, cancel the redundant account or terminate this agreement with the user.

In order to maintain the fairness of the game, we will seek a security audit by the gaming platform, and give the audit results and respond within a maximum of 120 days.

After confirming that the user has touched the relevant rules of the game or gambling activity, BET123.IO does not rule out freezing the game account of the user and deducting the account principal and profit.
activity.aboutus:
ABOUT Bet123.io

Having open mind, dedication, innovation, and fairness and justice, J9 been trusted and supported for a long time to create a win-win future. we provide users with ultimate security, the most stable network, smoothly deposits and withdrawals, and unlimited withdrawals. The official credit backing, relying on the future trend, aims to lead the trend of gambling, create a new situation of blockchain combined with traditional gambling, become the first choice of global winners.

 

MAIN PRODUCTS

Its main products including live video betting, online betting, sports and electronic games, and platform access, providing global entertainment enthusiasts with safety, fair and stable platform , provide one-stop services in order to create a brand new entertainment experience with diversity. Privacy and the safety of clients’ information always is J9’s priority caring.
